mapper.insert: insert into contact_channel (CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK ) values (#{contactChlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contactChlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactChlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactChlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactChlDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update contact_channel set CONTACT_CHL_CODE = #{contactChlCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_CHL_NAME = #{contactChlName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE = #{contactChlType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_CHL_DESC = #{contactChlDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHANNEL_TYPE = #{channelType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REGION_ID = #{regionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CONTACT_CHL_ID = #{contactChlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel where CONTACT_CHL_ID = #{contactChlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel channel where 1=1
and channel.CONTACT_CHL_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{channelName}),'%')

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel channel where 1=1 and channel.CONTACT_CHL_TYPE = #{channelType}

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel where PARENT_ID = 0

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel channel where PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
and CREATE_STAFF between 4 and 5
and CREATE_STAFF between 5 and 6
and CREATE_STAFF between 4 and 6
and CREATE_STAFF between 4 and 9

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel channel where CREATE_STAFF between 4 and 9

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel channel where PARENT_ID = #{parentId}

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel where PARENT_ID > 0

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel where CONTACT_CHL_CODE = #{code}

select t.CONTACT_CHL_CODE from contact_channel t where CONTACT_CHL_ID IN
#{item}

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel t where CONTACT_CHL_CODE IN
#{item}

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel where CREATE_STAFF in (5,6)

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel where CREATE_STAFF in (4,5)

select CONTACT_CHL_ID, CONTACT_CHL_CODE, CONTACT_CHL_NAME, CONTACT_CHL_TYPE, CONTACT_CHL_DESC, PARENT_ID, CHANNEL_TYPE, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, REGION_ID, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_DATE, REMARK from contact_channel where CONTACT_CHL_CODE in ('QD00034','QD00014','QD000015','QD00002','QD00007','QD00010','QD00017','QD00004','10001','QD00009')
